Articles.Content:
Hi all, i play KSP from about two months, i just started my space station.

I am italian, i used to learn all about electronics and informatics, i am a Bukkit developer (DebitCard and SpaceCraft) and i worked also to Android applications and VisualBasic software.

I have just learned to mod KSP, i have a great idea for a project.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T05:32:58Z" title="05/12/2015 05:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**

Welcome JarDev! Good to have you join the forums.

Good luck with your modding project.

Happy landings!
Welcome! Any chance of a teaser to your mod project? ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Welcome! Any chance of a teaser to your mod project? ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Usually i work alone
Welcome JarDev! Glad to meet you.

Welcome!

We're getting a lot of Italians recently, so you'll feel right at home.

When he says teaser, he means a taste of what is to come. Or along the lines of a sneek peek.
Yeah, sorry. I was asking for you to give us a sneak peek, a spoiler, a hint. Anything. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> We're getting a lot of Italians recently

It begins... 

Welcome JarDev!

> 
> Yeah, sorry. I was asking for you to give us a sneak peek, a spoiler, a hint. Anything. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Ahh sorry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), i can't say anything for now, someone can steal my project :c

> 
> Ahh sorry ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), i can't say anything for now, someone can steal my project :c

Eh, they might steal your idea, but if you're a good modder yours will trump over their's anyways. You could send me a private message, but I'm not THAT obsessed. Maybe after you get a WIP you can post it in the Add on WIP thread. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
